name: PCA
description: Runs a Principal Component Analysis to reduce the dimensionality of a dataset.

properties.name: scale
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the variables should be scaled to have unit variance before the analysis takes place.

properties.name: center
properties.description: A logical value indicating whether the variables should be shifted to be zero centered.

properties.name: na.action
properties.description: A function which indicates what should happen when the data contain NAs.

properties.name: tol
properties.description: A value indicating the magnitude below which components should be omitted. Components are omitted if their standard deviations are less than or equal to tol times the standard deviation of the first component.

properties.name: maxComp
properties.description: Maximum number of components to return.
